overview: During the 29 years of the Duvalier's rule, mass crimes were committed at different times, in different parts of the country against people of all classes and social groups, political or religious affiliations and of all skin shades. At a time when Jean-Claude Duvalier is called to court, will justice decide in favor of the victims? More than 50 witnesses, for and against examine this issue in a powerful face to face.
title: The Kingdom of Impunity
